document_data.mainbody:
Tezzarq was a drow spellspinner in the Underdark in 1379 DR.
Tezzarq was a member of House Masqilyr.
In 1379 DR, as a birthday gift for his matron mother, Tezzarq decided to buy ten elf slaves. So he went to Skullport and hired the slaver Lanador to fulfill the task. However, Lanadors minions accidentally captured a member of the Agents of the Eye so when Tezzarq went back to Skullport to pay Lanador and recover the slaves he was confronted by an adventuring party supported by the Xanathar.Derek Myers. "Eyes on The Ball." Dungeon #206. Renton, WA Wizards of the Coast, September 2012.
